entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
